[h1]Great Game, Not for me tho.[/h1]

It's a straight forward Arcade PVP Game. You and 3 other players, versus 1 killer which is also a player. There's other DLC that can get other killers. Do what you can to survive with perks you can unlock each time you (most likely) die straight 10 times before you can actually survive.

The items that you gather can be brought into your next game against the killers. You may be able to survive better next time. I think you can get unlimited items? I don't know.

Overall, it was okay. PVP games is not my thing. 7/10. Would refund again.
if you are a former console player like me, this game is worth a buy. 60 fps makes it almost like a new game.

At a glance: A fun party game, with lots of competitive potential. 8/10

Dead by Daylight is a very unique asymmetrical 4v1 horror game, and (as far as I know) is the first in the genre to really capture a gloomy and terror-filled atmosphere. The game is spooky, no doubt, and the fact that the people chasing you are actual players can make things even more adrenaline-pumping. Combined with iconic killers and beasts, such as the Ghostface killer and Micheal Myers, and constant updates that introduce new characters, maps, and perks, the game keeps offering more and more. While the best killers and characters are free, there is now a small problem arising of not enough free characters. Out of the 5 free survivors (Bill included), and 4 killers, things will become dull for players who wish to keep at the understandable 20$ price range. But, other than that, the game is a blast, and playing with friends is just as fun as actually murdering peo- uh, ignore that.

Favorite game! Aside from the bugs this game is perfect, you can pretty much do anything which is great. I love how you can customize your character as much as you want from skins, perks, items and so on. I do however wish the developers would pay more attention to what they're adding to the game... A lot of content has been nerfed because it was either too powerful or because people complain about it. I know this is a 4 year old game but I would love to see some more maps because I love grinding bloodpoints and sometimes it can get a bit boring or repetitive after awhile. Dead by Daylight definitely has its ups and downs but overall this game is pretty balanced. 8/10 would buy again.
Very Fun Game To Play With Friends! Very much would recommend to people! 33hrs in 2 days and love it!!!

First of all, we should understand before the game that dawn killing is a competitive game with an asymmetric number of players, only one of whom plays the villain. There are many advantages and disadvantages of the game. I will try my best to express what I have played in 500 + hours below. The background of the game is still very novel. The four survivors should try to avoid the killer's pursuit, pay attention to the killer's trap all the time, maintain the generator to power the gate, and finally escape from the test field. The playability of the game is still very high. Although there is only one mode, you have to face all kinds of routines of different killer players. You also have to try every way to avoid the killer's pursuit. (it's more exciting for my little friend to open black) although the team is not big, they have been trying to update more things. They have never given up on anti cheating, and they have always put it in the first place. From the beginning of 60 + RMB to now, 80 + RMB is actually understandable. The production team also needs to make money. They also need to eat. It takes a lot of energy and time to make a game. It takes more time to improve it Energy and money, and the production team did not forget the original intention of making the game because of the popularity of the game, and the game extra expansion (DLC) is not expensive, the country generally does not exceed 30 yuan, 30 yuan you can play more content in the game, buy DLC is also a way to support the production team to support the game. The production team said that if you don't want to buy DLC, you just can't play new characters often. The map is always open to all players. The characters will give some props, so that you can experience the DLC characters (such as the black splits in the killer blood network) without spending money.
Here are my views on balance and anti cheating:
The killer is too strong. Let's cut the human.
The killer is the production team's own son. In recent versions, human beings have been chipping away. From the beginning, human beings turned over the window and weakened it (later, the change was canceled). Now, human beings have limped. The production team changed the speed of human beings in the previous version, which is undoubtedly a great blow to human players. Now, the window flipping change, together with the evil spirit sealing window, is invincible in the wild Dynamic (e.g. LT, ll terrain).
There are also the recent versions of the enhancement of killers, which has greatly reduced the number of human players. Nowadays, human beings are basically at two extremes, either playing extremely well or being new to the game, and the change of matching mechanism makes the rank distribution of the game messy. The new killers of 20 segments can meet the first segment of the emperor, and the new humans of 20 segments can also be ranked in all kinds of emperors, as well as all kinds of cheating The whole game atmosphere is not good, and the production team has no good way to stop the modification and cheating (the previous versions also added EAC anti cheating, yesterday's updated version also came out with a reporting system, and the situation should change later), but after all, it's a small company, it's good to do so much, and the production team has not given up on the management of cheating And modify the archive, which is laudable.
Generally speaking, the game is still good. From the beginning to now, I have experienced and been used to all versions. One generation of version one generation of God.

El juego est√° bueno, o sea, no es un simple juego casual en el que jug√°s un rato y ya est√°. El juego tiene muchas mec√°nicas que vas a tener que ir puliendo de a poco, tanto de killer como de survi, y a medida que vas mejorando el juego se hace m√°s divertido.
En cuanto a la toxicidad del chat despu√©s de la partida: siempre te van a putear, y capaz vos tambi√©n lo hagas, pero eso es t√≠pico de los juegos competitivos y a la larga terminan o aburri√©ndote o divirti√©ndote, no te vas a enojar toda la vida porque un pibe te insulte a tu vieja porque lo mataste.
Lo que si creo es que tiene que mejorar muchas cosas que se nota que est√°n muy mal, como la hitbox exageradamente grande de los survis, o que te empareje con gente de rango muy distinto. Por todo lo dem√°s, el juego es recomendable.
